column1: commence the preliminary survey.  In  the case  of Uberis Vs.  Jayawardhana 62  NlR
"It is  th e duty of a Surveyor to whom th e Commission is  issued to adhere strictly to
its terms and locate  and survey the land which  is commissioned to survey.  It  is not
open to him to survey th e land pointed out by one or more of the parties and prepare
and submit to  Court the plan  and report of such  a survey.  If he is  unable to locate
